resources.string: As part of a research project of De La Salle University, the GetBetter Tele-Diagnosis System was designed and developed with financial support form UNICEF, UNDP, World Bank, the WHO Special Programme for Research and Training in Tropical Diseases (WHO-TDR). The GetBetter team sincerely hopes that this GetBetter Tele-Diagnosis System will be instrumental in providing quality healthcare to people from rural, poor and geographically isolated areas. We believe that the poor and the marginalized should be able to benefit from the major strides of progress in Internet and database technology, and ICT in general.
